extendedInfo.description: European War (musket & artillery) is a new style strategy game for Android(like Risk). It takes you to battleground Europe during the eighteenth century and nineteenth century. In this game many tactics been used in order to defeat the other forces. You can select six empires: British, French, Ottoman, Russia, Germany and Austro-Hungary in this age. If your army conquest enemyâs territory your total tax revenue will be improved. You would get all of the empireâs Territories and improve yourself total tax revenue after your army conquered enemyâs Capital. Tax can be used to purchase cards (Draft Card, General Card, Marshal Card, Ship Card, Fortress Card, Cannon Fire Card.)   A large number of real historical elements ensure the quality of the game, while the card system greatly improved playfulness and interesting. The game is no longer the same as the previous board strategy game by selecting the command to determine the strategy, but achieve the effect via the cards and dice. Firstly, in order to simplify the operation, secondly is to use a more flexible and relaxed approach to the interpretation of the essence of war. While the game is full of smoke flavor, but the ultimate aim let players relax, reduce stress, and therefore regard the strategy and the screen as important, and strive to excellence in these two sides.FEATURES: -Include five difficulty levels. -Include 6 common cards and 6 empireâs special cards. -Include two mode: CONQUEST MODE and BATTLE MODE. -CONQUEST MODE: select one of the six empires to defeat other empires. -BATTLE MODE: select six campaigns (Battle of Toulon (1793), Battle of Marengo (1800), Battle of Austerlitz (1805), Battle of Tannenberg (1914), Battle of Galicia (1914), Battle of Gallipoli (1914)) . -72 Territories (include sea and capital) every territory has its taxation. -Extend risk style battle mode (easy, various and interesting). Comfortable operation makes you play this game easier and have more fun.Note: This game requires that the device has high graphics performance, some Android devices without GPU,such as HTC G3, may not run this game smoothly.

reviews.title: European war
reviews.comment: Very nice, not too difficult but nice to while away a few minutes. Turns do take some time to complete, though, making you wait.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problem
reviews.comment: Played the game loved it, the historic battles are fun, but now it zooms in to the lower left screen... (Atrix 2)
reviews.author: Stone Duro.

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Awesome!

reviews.title: Horrible and crappy
reviews.comment: Looked ok in the shop but a waste of money.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Very engaging game of wits and tactics. I really enjoy it.

reviews.title: X
reviews.comment: Brilliant!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was good, is now bad.
reviews.comment: Not fixed for this high-res screen - DROID 4 (same problem as earlier reported for the RAZR). It looks like the opposite of a fix. I used to play this game a lot. Now, the bottom left is zoomed 4x. Everything else is off screen. Quite unplayable.  Use dips!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Okay. Needs more missions though. Second one is way better. Still cool.

reviews.comment: Zooms in to the bottom left corner

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: AI wont even attack me, beat it three times, been attacked one or twice each time.  So easy when the computer doesnt even try, even on hardest setting.  Game is worth $0.99 at most, if not free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hours of fun
reviews.comment: Decent Ai on hard setting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I play this game often. I like the dice rolling because it seems to take into account troop numbers on both sides of battle. Random dice rolls would suck. A lot of fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sweet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun and addictive, just wish there were more countries to choose from
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor graphics and boring gameplay
reviews.comment: The overview does not mention that there is no full screen for tablets so using it on a Transformer TF101 is the same as a phone (unless I have missed something). The game-play is a bit tedious and not very interesting, I found the iphone version of risk a more entertaining game to pass the time - would like to see this across on the Android market. I would increase my score for European War if full screen for tablets was available and there were ways of speeding up the game-play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bleh...
reviews.comment: It\'s flat. There\'s not much to do. And the dice throws are not random. You pay to much for to little.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dice rolls not random.
reviews.comment: Harder ai is just the game reducing your odds of rolling a 5 or 6
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Near great game
reviews.comment: Great addictive risk style game. Does not go full screen on galaxy tab unfortunately and user interface could be a little bit more streamlined. Card system is a nice touch. Good and enjoyable overall. Expect a couple of hours to go missing in your day.
reviews.author: A Google User
